actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore fair limits on pension benefits for working Americans covered by collectively bargained, labor-management retirement plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to apply early retirement rules to multiemployer plans in the same manner as plans maintained by government and tax-exempt organizations. Limits compensation under such plans for purposes of benefit payments.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore fair limits on pension benefits for working Americans covered by collectively bargained, labor-management retirement plans.
